content.name: Python
content.description: My favorite language — I use it in most of my projects.
achievements: FastAPI for building modern APIs
Robust unit testing with Pytest and Unittest
Widely used in AI and data-related projects

content.name: Next
content.description: My go-to framework for building web apps.
achievements: Perfect to create SaaS applications
Quick to set up and ideal for dynamic interfaces
Perfect for full-stack web development

content.name: Typescript
content.description: I use it in all my web projects.
achievements: Improves code clarity with type safety
Works seamlessly with ESLint and modern frameworks

content.name: React
content.description: My go-to library for building modern and dynamic web interfaces.
achievements: Built complex, responsive, and interactive UI components
Used in combination with Next.js for high-performance web apps

content.name: Swift
content.description: My favorite language for mobile development.
achievements: Clean syntax and powerful IDE (Xcode)
Excellent native UI frameworks (SwiftUI, UIKit)
Excellent official documentation and community support

content.name: Java
content.description: A great language for enterprise-level applications.
achievements: Built stable backends with Spring Boot
Valuable for scalable architectures
Applied in real-world business environments

content.name: C
content.description: The first language I used during the core curriculum at 42.
achievements: Helped me understand low-level memory management
Gained deep understanding of how computers work

content.name: C++
content.description: The second language I used during the core curriculum at 42.
achievements: Great for mastering object-oriented programming concepts
Popular and backed by strong documentation

content.name: Docker
achievements: Containerization of frontend and backend services
Simplifies deployment and environment consistency
Ideal for multi-machine development setups
